fields.summary: [VZ8CHR2fA][WEBui]Unable to Enable DMZ IPv4 Host in WebUI

status.description: SW with updated config was released
status.name: INTEGRATED

fields.summary: The Router shall support construction of DMZ to distribute inbound service traffic requests. The user shall be able to specify a MAC address or IP address that when connected to the device shall be placed in the DMZ and exposed directly to the WAN.
The Router shall allow the user to specify a DMZ service host and corresponding port access rules. The Router shall have a provision to identify the DMZ host by LAN-side IP address, or host name

The Router shall have a provision to populate the inbound and outbound ports that the DMZ host may access. The Router shall allow the user to enable/disable access to the DMZ host thru Router GUI or client facing application.
The Router shall support a DMZ function. The DMZ function shall support rules inbound and outbound from the trusted and untrusted ports as defined in [rfc2888] and [rfc2694].
IPv6 (part 2) address textual format, northbound RFC compliance, security

status.description: SW with updated config was released

fields.summary: The device shall support IPv6 DMZ function configurable through GUI. By default, such function shall not be enabled to any LAN side host

fields.summary: The Router shall allow end user to block specific protocols and ports. Specific Service Access, Port Forwarding, ACL and DMZ rules should override the general firewall rules as defined in [rfc7288].

status.description: SW with updated config was released
status.name: INTEGRATED

fields.Action:
* Access to the WebUI, 
 * Navigate to Firewall -> DMZ Host
 * Enable DMZ IPv4 Host, based on IPv4 address (for the actual IPv4 host on LAN)
fields.Expected Result: The host is reachable from WAN

fields.Action: Check that the rule exists under DM
fields.Expected Result:
*E.g.:*
{code:java}
> Firewall.DMZ.1.?
Firewall.DMZ.1.
Firewall.DMZ.1.Alias="wanDMZ"
Firewall.DMZ.1.Description="Default instance for the UI."
Firewall.DMZ.1.DestIP="192.168.1.123"
Firewall.DMZ.1.Enable=1
Firewall.DMZ.1.Interface="Device.Logical.Interface.1."
Firewall.DMZ.1.Origin="User"
Firewall.DMZ.1.SourcePrefix=""
Firewall.DMZ.1.Status="Enabled" {code}

security.description: Only SoftAtHome people can access the issue
security.name: SAH
